snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire who owns the Nets, held a wide-ranging news conference Tuesday at Barclays Center, which is under construction in Brooklyn.
abstract: New Jersey Nets owner Mikhail D Prokhorov holds wide-ranging news conference at Barclays Center, the Nets future home arena which is currently under construction in Brooklyn; says he hopes to keep star point guard Deron Williams.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire who owns the Nets, held a wide-ranging news conference Tuesday at Barclays Center, which is under construction in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Owner Says the Nets and New Arena Remain Hard-Hat Zones
headline.main: Owner Says the Nets and a New Arena Remain Hard-Hat Zones
headline.print_headline: Owner Says the Nets and a New Arena Remain Hard-Hat Zones
